participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly with a cheerful disposition. Enjoys socializing and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I drink lots of iced tea and I try to do my laundry at least once a week. I am tall and blonde. I do not like animals. I dress for my audience. I have two secrets from my parents.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and creative, loves to engage in various hobbies and enjoys being active and social.
participant_2.background: I moved because I wanted to be closer to my new love. I dyed my hair pink. I am very good at math and science. I joined a new gym near my home in New Mexico to continue my athletic pursuits. My dog is my best friend and the only one who can tolerate my clumsiness.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi!
How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm excited to be here talking to you!
I'm excited to be talking to you too! I'm always up for a good conversation.
What are your favorite things to do?
I love to read, play video games, and go to the gym. I also love to spend time with my family and friends.
Those all sound like great things to do! I love to read and play video games too. I'm not very good at the gym, but I try!
That's great! I'm always looking for new people to play video games with.
I would love to play video games with you sometime! I'm not very good, but I have fun.
That sounds great! I'm sure we'll have a lot of fun playing together.
I'm sure we will too! What are some of your favorite video games?
I love playing Minecraft, Fortnite, and Call of Duty.
I've played Minecraft a little bit, but I'm not very good at it. I've never played Fortnite or Call of Duty.
They're all great games! I'm sure you'd have a lot of fun playing them.
I'd love to try them out!
We should definitely play some time!
That sounds great! I'm free this weekend if you want to play.
This weekend sounds perfect! I'll send you a message with my gamertag.
Great! I'll see you then!
